name: Star Miner Zarboz
description:
mining vessel ZARBOZ drifts through the empty eyorite ore fields just beyond the edge of inhabited space

endless tons of ore  drift unconcerned past the ship, glittering in the light of the distant sun

the asteroids hang in the void like a question

like the only question anyone this far out asks

the only question that burns bright in the mind of every miner living out here on the rim

are you good enough at left clicking?

-------------------------------------------------------------------

Note that this game is incomplete and there are no unlocks after the satellite dish.

Also saving/loading doesn't work, sorry!

Also I think there's a bug with the auto fire upgrades if you buy more than a few on one turret that breaks everything.
